channel.title: Dementhium teleport help

item.title: Dementhium teleport help
item.dc:creator: @eri0nn eri0nn
item.description:
@eri0nn wrote:

How can I check when a animation and gfx is finished?
Does dementhium have a cycle based task manager implemented? Because Magic teleports work, I tried to copy it but it didn’t work.

And so how can I implement a cycle based task manager in dementhium?

Read full topic

item.title: Dementhium teleport help
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

use a cycle based task manager and schedule the teleport for when the anims and gfx are finished

Read full topic

I’m getting errors, and it says its tested only till rs2hd.

So is there any other way, anyone?

item.title: Dementhium teleport help
item.dc:creator: @eri0nn eri0nn
item.description:
@eri0nn wrote:

Hi guys,

In my server (dementhium base) I have been trying to fix teleports, because when you teleport it only goes there, without animation and gfx so I did this:

if (command[0].equals("home")){ player.animate(8939); player.graphics(1576); player.teleport(3087, 3495, 0); player.animate(8941); player.graphics(1577); }

But still when I try to teleport, I can only see the ending animation and graphic, so it goes to the:

so fast, so I want any ideas on how to fix that. I thought of making a delay after the first animation and gfx, but I don’t know how to do it.

Read full topic
